line.title: Number of People in Canada Employed from February 2025 to June 2025 By Age Group
line.description: This graph shows how many people, by age group and gender, were employed in Canada from Ferbuary 2025 to June 2025.

bar.title: Adult admissions to correctional services in Canada from 2018 to 2023
bar.description: This graph shows how many adults were admitted to correctional services, admitted to probation or sentence in Canada from February 2025 to June 2025.
